title: Who's Watching the Kids?
overview: The story of two showgirls Stacy and Angie at the seedy "Club Sand Pile" in Las Vegas. The girls share an apartment with Frankie, Angie's 15-yr-old brother and Melissa, Stacy's 9-yr-old sister. Angie and Stacy's problem: who can watch their kids when they're working? Their solution: Larry, a KVGS-TV newscaster, and Burt, his cameraman, their neighbors who babysit when they can, to impress the girls.
